name: Friday Night Funkin' X Rian the Stickman
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' X Rian the Stickman
description:
"A really powerful being appeared out of nowhere while you were gone and no one is able to match them!"

While heading home after his last adventure, Rian is confronted by the scientist, Ms. Motive!  He learns about a threat that has invaded stick city, but there's a catch! The only way to beat them is with... A microphone?



This mod has...

  • 9 songs as of version 1.5!
  • Multiple characters and environments!
  • A 4 song week with CGs and animated cutscenes!
  • A new "YOOO!" judgement for tighter timing!
  • New "PFC" rank for the best of players!

...And more to come in future updates!
